kDesc

The Prairie Ultimate Pack

 This pack includes the following: 
 • The Prairie Saloon (Clubhouse)
 • The Prairie Ranch (Apartment)
 • LMO - Saddled Mustang - Black
 • LMO - Saddled Mustang - Dapple Grey
 • LMO - Saddled Mustang - Steel Grey 
 • LMO - Saddled Pinto Pony - Skewbald 
 • LMO - Saddled Mustang - Palomino
 • LMO - Saddled Pretty Pony - Pink
 • LMO - Saddled Mustang - Grey 
 • LMO - Mustang - Dapple Grey
 • LMO - Mustang - Grey 

 The Prairie Saloon and The Prairie Ranch both contain the Horse Care Game which has 7 in-game rewards. Each space also contains 4 unique rewards, including one available to guests! [#Legal]

Le pack ultime de la prairie

 Ce pack inclut les éléments suivants : 
 • Le saloon de la prairie (club-house)
 • Le ranch de la prairie (appartement)
 • LMO – Mustang sellé – Noir
 • LMO – Mustang sellé – Gris tacheté
 • LMO – Mustang sellé – Gris acier
 • LMO – Cheval pie sellé – Pie
 • LMO – Mustang sellé – Palomino
 • LMO – Joli poney sellé – Rose
 • LMO – Mustang sellé – Gris
 • LMO – Mustang – Gris tacheté
 • LMO – Mustang – Gris

 Le saloon de la prairie et le ranch de la prairie contiennent tous les deux le jeu de traitement du cheval et ses 7 récompenses en jeu. Chaque espace contient également 4 récompenses uniques, l'une d'entre elles étant également disponible pour les invités ! [#Legal]

Ultimatives Prärie-Paket

 Dieses Paket enthält: 
 • Der Prärie-Saloon (Klubhaus)
 • Die Prärie-Ranch (Appartement)
 • LMO - Gesattelter Mustang - Schwarz
 • LMO - Gesattelter Mustang - Grau gesprenkelt
 • LMO - Gesattelter Mustang - Stahlgrau
 • LMO - Gesatteltes Scheckenpony - Braun-Weiß
 • LMO - Gesattelter Mustang - Palomino
 • LMO - Gesatteltes hübsches Pony - Rosa
 • LMO - Gesattelter Mustang - Grau
 • LMO - Mustang - Grau gesprenkelt
 • LMO - Mustang - Grau

 Der Prärie-Saloon und die Prärie-Ranch enthalten das Pferdespiel mit 7 Belohnungen. Jeder Bereich enthält auch 4 einmalige Belohnungen, wovon eins auch für Gäste erhältlich ist! [#Legal]

Il pacchetto Prateria definitivo

 Questo pacchetto include quanto segue: 
 • Saloon nella Prateria (Clubhouse)
 • Il Ranch nella Prateria (Appartamento)
 • LMO - Mustang sellato - Nero
 • LMO - Mustang sellato - Pezzato grigio
 • LMO - Mustang sellato - Grigio acciaio
 • LMO - Pony pezzato sellato - Ubero
 • LMO - Mustang sellato - Palomino
 • LMO - Pony grazioso sellato - Rosa
 • LMO - Mustang sellato - Grigio 
 • LMO - Mustang - Pezzato grigio
 • LMO - Mustang - Grigio 

 Il Saloon nella Prateria e Il Ranch nella Prateria contengono entrambi il gioco Cura del cavallo in cui ci sono 7 ricompense in gioco. Ogni spazio contiene anche 4 ricompense uniche, tra cui una disponibile per gli ospiti! [#Legal]

El paquete definitivo de la pradera

 Este paquete incluye: 
 • El salón de la pradera (club).
 • El rancho de la pradera (apartamento).
 • LMO; Mustang ensillado; Negro.
 • LMO; Mustang ensillado; Tordo.
 • LMO; Mustang ensillado; Plateado.
 • LMO; Pony pinto ensillado; Pinto.
 • LMO; Mustang ensillado; Palomino.
 • LMO; Pony pinto ensillado; Rosa.
 • LMO; Mustang ensillado; Gris.
 • LMO; Mustang; Tordo.
 • LMO; Mustang; Gris.

 Tanto el salón como el rancho de la pradera contienen el Juego de cuidados del caballo que cuenta con siete recompensas del juego. ¡Además, cada espacio cuenta con cuatro recompensas únicas, incluida una disponible para los invitados! [#Legal]

The Prairie Ultimate Pack

 This pack includes the following: 
 • The Prairie Saloon (Clubhouse)
 • The Prairie Ranch (Apartment)
 • LMO - Saddled Mustang - Black
 • LMO - Saddled Mustang - Dapple Grey
 • LMO - Saddled Mustang - Steel Grey 
 • LMO - Saddled Pinto Pony - Skewbald 
 • LMO - Saddled Mustang - Palomino
 • LMO - Saddled Pretty Pony - Pink
 • LMO - Saddled Mustang - Grey 
 • LMO - Mustang - Dapple Grey
 • LMO - Mustang - Grey 

 The Prairie Saloon and The Prairie Ranch both contain the Horse Care Game which has 7 in-game rewards. Each space also contains 4 unique rewards, including one available to guests!


※Upon purchase, the items will be placed into their respective categories. [#Legal]
